data.text: Lɔnni bara a xa banxi ti fanye solofere fari.
A bara xuruse nde faxa, a wɛni yailan,
A bara xɛɛrae xɛɛ taa kui mixi xilife ra,
Wo xa fa n ma taami don,
Wo xa gbilen fe ɲaaxie fɔxɔ ra,
Mixi yo naxan katama yɛtɛ igboe matinxinde,
Xa i xurutare rasi, a i xɔnma nɛ.
Lɔnni fɔlɔma Alatala xa yaragaaxui nan ma.
I xa duniɲɛigiri xɔn kuyama nɛ lɔnni ra,
Xaxilitareɲa luxi nɛ alɔ ginɛ naxan dɛ wuya,
A dɔxɔma a xa banxi sode dɛ nan na
alako a xa dangi mixie xili a xui itexi ra,
A a falama mixie bɛ naxee mu fahaamui sɔtɔxi,
E mu a kolon faxɛ dimi nan mɛnni ra.
